overview: Riding a bicycle is one of the simplest pleasures in life - but it`s nothing compared to the overriding joy of fucking some cute twink`s tight arse, as this bunch of horned-up beauties are only too eager and willing to demonstrate! Kris Blent and Chris Jansen lead the cast as they head to Czechia from Holland and Denmark respectively; discovering a whole legion of cock-crazed cyclists (new boys Seb Priestley and Johnathan Strake amongst them) who are not so much interested in joining the Tour De Czech as the Tour De Suck-and-Fuck!
title: Biker Boyz
